description:
Make tracks in these cross-country pants that are made to keep you in motion. Stretchy and weather-resistant, they provide warmth and breathability in equal measure, and won't get in the way when you’re pushing the pace. Full-length side openings allow for easy on and off while wearing ski boots.

  • Polyester R-Wind fabric blocks the wind and keeps out the chill
  • Lightweight polyester Bird Eye Mesh lining feels soft against the skin
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • Elastic drawcord waist lets you fine tune the fit
  • Full length side zippers mean you can pull them off while your boots are still on
  • Packs down small for convenient storage
name: Rossignol Active Versatile XC Pant - Men's
